nl.inl.blacklab.searches

Class SearchHits

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.searches.AbstractSearch<R>
      • nl.inl.blacklab.searches.SearchResults<Hits>
        • nl.inl.blacklab.searches.SearchHits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Search<Hits>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchHitsFiltered, SearchHitsFromPattern, SearchHitsSampled, SearchHitsSorted, SearchHitsWindow

    public abstract class SearchHits
extends SearchResults<Hits>
    A search that yields hits.

    • Method Detail

      • docs

        public SearchDocs docs(int maxResultsToGatherPerGroup)
        Group hits by document. This is a special case because it takes advantage of the fact that Lucene returns results per document, so we don't have to fetch all hits to produce document results.
        Parameters:
        maxResultsToGatherPerGroup - how many results to gather per group
        Returns:
        resulting operation

        maxResultsToGatherPerGroup - how many results to gather per group
        Returns:
        resulting operation

      • collocations

        public SearchCollocations collocations(Annotation annotation,
                                       ContextSize size,
                                       MatchSensitivity sensitivity)
        Count words occurring near these hits.
        Parameters:
        annotation - the property to use for the collocations (must have a forward index)
        size - context size to use for determining collocations
        sensitivity - sensitivity settings
        Returns:
        resulting operation
